title: After seeing a thread about white potatoes and McDonalds, it brings up a question
body:
You people eat so unhealthy. And it's OK because it's your choice. You can chose to be wrong.

But why do you people hate on me for having an amazing body and being physically superior as a result of eating correctly?

I know it's jealousy and envy but you made a choice. You choose to be you. I could even tell you the right way but you wouldn't do it because it's "too much work".

You people shouldn't hate me for it, you should embrace me for eating clean and being better than you.
